mapper.sql: id, dept_id, broker_id, is_delete, updated_by, created_by, updated_time, created_time
mapper.select: select broker_id from fke_dept_user where dept_id = #{dept_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and is_delete = 1 order by id

select fdu.id,fdu.dept_id,fdu.broker_id,fbi.realname,fm.username as mobile,fbi.avatar as photo from fke_dept_user fdu,20171206fangchan.fke_member fm ,20171206fangchan.fke_broker_info fbi where dept_id = #{dept_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and fdu.is_delete = '1' and fdu.broker_id = fm.id and fm.is_broker = '1' and status = '1' and fm.id = fbi.id
and fbi.realname like concat(concat('%',#{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
order by fdu.updated_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into fke_dept_user (dept_id, broker_id, is_delete, updated_by, created_by, updated_time, created_time) values (#{dept_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{broker_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{is_delete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updated_by,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{created_by,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updated_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{created_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into fke_dept_user (dept_id, broker_id, is_delete, updated_by, created_by, updated_time, created_time) values
(#{item.dept_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.broker_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, 1, #{item.updated_by,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.created_by,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NOW(), NOW())
